meta.evidence: The frequency domain shift value n_{\text {shift }} adjusts the SRS allocation with respect to the reference point grid and is contained in the higher-layer parameter freqDomainShift in the SRS-Resource [E or the SRS-PosResource [E. The transmission comb offset \bar{k}_{\mathrm{TC}} \in\left\{0,1, \ldots, K_{\mathrm{TC}}-1\right\} is contained in the higher-layer parameter transmission C o m b in the SRS-Resource [E or the SRS-PosResource [E and n_{b} is a frequency position index. Frequency hopping of the sounding reference signal is configured by the parameter b_{\text {hop }} \in\{0,1,2,3\} , given by the field b -hop contained in the higher-layer parameter freqHopping if configured, otherwise b_{\text {hop }}=0 .
